description:
Luca McCain is Jim McCain`s (Alois Trancy`s) younger brother.
Luca is a lighthearted young child and very supporting of his older brother, saying whatever Jim wishes has to come true. In episode eight when Jim tells Luca to never leave his side, Luca replies with Claude`s line, "Yes, your Highness."
Later in the same episode, Jim calls out for Luca but gets no answer, and finds him lying on the ground dead.
name: Luca McCain
